app.name: tadoc
app.tagline: Record, analyze, and remember your doctor visits

auth.signInDescription: Enter your email and password to access your appointments
auth.signUpDescription: Create your account to start tracking appointments
auth.checkEmailVerify: Please check your email to verify your account

dashboard.recordVisitsDesc: Click on any appointment to record audio during your visit
dashboard.shareVisitsDesc: Share visit recordings with family or other doctors
dashboard.getAiInsightsDesc: Receive personalized medical insights from your visit recordings
dashboard.noUpcomingDesc: Click "New Appointment" to schedule your first visit
dashboard.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create appointments

appointment.reasonPlaceholder: Describe the reason for your appointment
appointment.goalPlaceholder: What do you hope to achieve?
appointment.checkFormErrors: Please check the form for errors

visitDetails.title: Visit Details
visitDetails.speakNow: Speak now. Transcription will happen when you stop.
visitDetails.transcribedSuccessfully: Your audio has been transcribed successfully.
visitDetails.noTranscription: No transcription available. The audio may have been too short.
visitDetails.recordOrAddNotes: Please record something or add notes before analyzing.
visitDetails.unableToAnalyze: Unable to analyze visit. Please try again.
visitDetails.visitAnalyzedSaved: Your visit has been analyzed and saved.

share.loginToShare: Please log in to share visits
share.emailsNotRegistered: The following email addresses are not registered:
share.visitSharedWith: Visit summary has been shared with {{count}} recipient
share.visitSharedWith_plural: Visit summary has been shared with {{count}} recipients
share.checkFormErrors: Please check the form for errors

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences.
settings.emailChangeNotSupported: Email changes are not currently supported. Contact support if you need to update your email.
settings.supportDesc: Need help? Get in touch with our support team.
settings.supportText: For technical support, questions, or feedback, please contact us at:
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone. All of your appointments, visit records, shared visits, and personal information will be permanently removed.
settings.cannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
settings.allAppointments: All your appointments and visit records
settings.pleaseTypeDelete: Please type 'DELETE' to confirm account deletion.
settings.errorDeletingDesc: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.
settings.accountDeletedDesc: Your account and all data have been permanently deleted.
settings.languageUpdatedDesc: Your language preference has been saved.
